Vision

ESSO's vision is to represent the most established cancer treatment. To this end, ESSO will develop standards of care for cancer patients through its core values, education, homogenisation of skills, quality and ultimately qualification.

ESSO's goals:
1) Education: To become the main educational platform for surgical oncology in a multidisciplinary environment
2) Science and QA: To investigate and promote optimal quality in surgical oncology in Europe
3) Cooperation: To become a major partner of all specialists in all disciplines in oncology including other oncology societies, oncology nurses and patient organizations
4) Oncopolicy: To establish surgical oncology as a core specialty in optimal care for cancer patients
5) Guidelines: To facilitate availability of quality multidisciplinary guidelines
6) Communication: To establish general awareness and acceptance of added value of ESSO for members, peers, patients and policymakers
